definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
one divides into two/to be two-sided/there are two sides to everything/to see both sb's good points and shortcomings (idiom)

sentences.english: The dissertation consists of introduction and four parts.
sentences.chinese: 全文分为绪论和四个主要章节。

sentences.english: To hit(a ball) into the air just beyond the infield.
sentences.chinese: 棒球场分为内场和外场。

sentences.english: Spread foundations generally can be classified as wall and column footings.
sentences.chinese: 扩展基础通常可分为墙基和柱基。

sentences.english: The piece is in one movement divided into three parts.
sentences.chinese: 全曲只有一个乐章而分为三个部分。

sentences.english: It is divided into two parts: principal structure and ecological structure.
sentences.chinese: 哭嫁歌分为主体结构和生态结构两个部分。

sentences.english: The first part introduces the outline of our traffic developing in Changde.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分为常德市交通违法的防控策略。

sentences.english: This part is also the key point of this article. It is divides into three aspects.
sentences.chinese: 该部分也是本文的重点所在，分为三个方面。

sentences.english: Divided into two sub-type mold, plastic parts in the top and vertical center.
sentences.chinese: 模具分为两次分型，分别在塑件顶部和竖直中心。

sentences.english: Chinese gardens can be divided into two categories,  the imperial and the private.
sentences.chinese: 中国园林可分为御花园和私家花园两类。

sentences.english: According to this, germplasms were classified into two types, that was maintainer lines and restoring lines .
sentences.chinese: 据此将香稻资源分为保持系和恢复系两类。

sentences.english: The spermatid differentiation can be divided into five stages.
sentences.chinese: 精细胞的分化可分为五个时期。

sentences.english: The building consists of two parts as visitor center and rural guest houses.
sentences.chinese: 该建筑分为游客中心和乡村客舍两部分。

sentences.english: Each Ojibwa tribe was divided into migratory bands.
sentences.chinese: 奥吉布瓦人各部落都分为若干迁徙性家族。

sentences.english: Likwise, the sensilla auricillica also can be subdivided into two distinct types(type A and type B).
sentences.chinese: 耳形感器根据其形态也可分为A型和B型两类。

sentences.english: There are two ways in structuring handwritten documents, off-line and on-line.
sentences.chinese: 目前关于手写文档的结构化，分为联机和脱机两种。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, ceramics product can is classified into two categories: practical and artistic.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，陶瓷产品可以分为两类，即。

definition: can be divided (into parts)/one can distinguish (several types)
to divide (into)/to split a bonus/to break into/tenths/percentage allotment
to be collectively called/collective term/general designation
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
in general/more or less/in rough terms/basically/on the whole/overall situation/the big picture/(Tw) remains (of a dead person)
to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
